dcterms:creator: R. Shao
T. Wu
Z. Liu
dcterms:description: The DGM4 dataset contains 230K image-text paired samples with over 77K pristine pairs and 152K manipulated pairs, featuring various types of manipulation including face swap and text swap. It is designed for detecting and grounding multi-modal media manipulation.
dcterms:title: DGM4 dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Luo
T. Darrell
A. Rohrbach
dcterms:description: The NewsCLIPpings dataset is used for automatic generation of out-of-context multimodal media, providing mismatched image and text pairs for benchmarking multi-modal models.
dcterms:title: NewsCLIPpings dataset

dcterms:creator: Y. Qian
G. Yin
L. Sheng
Z. Chen
J. Shao
dcterms:description: The F3-Net dataset is utilized for face forgery detection by mining frequency-aware clues, focusing on the frequency domain to enhance detection capabilities.
dcterms:title: F3-Net dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Rossler
D. Cozzolino
L. Verdoliva
C. Riess
J. Thies
M. Nie√üner
dcterms:description: FaceForensics++ is a dataset designed for learning to detect manipulated facial images, providing a benchmark for various face forgery detection methods.
dcterms:title: FaceForensics++
